Старая добрая первая халфа, в которую ещё рубился в нулевых, сидя в компьютерном клубе за ламповым монитором после школы играя с одноклассниками по локалке. Она ещё была совмещена с CS 1.5 и прочими модами типа The Specialist, Vampire Slayer и пр.

[h1] 相见恨晚 [/h1]
[hr][/hr]
这款20多年前的游戏，在现在看来依然有着不错的射击感，丰富的敌人和武器设计，剧情上耐人寻味，让我有点上头。每天玩一会儿玩了一星期，最后没忍住周末通宵把它给通了、

很遗憾小时候没接触到这款游戏，当时天天被拉着打CS，然而根本打不过以至于没什么游戏体验。PvP的FPS实在是我的一生之敌，反应比别人慢一截真是一辈子都打不过。还是PvE适合我，不太吃反应，再难的关卡多想想办法总归还是能过的、

困难难度通关花了20小时左右，期间卡过两三次关，参考[url=https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1ob411v72w?p=1] B站视频 [/url]过的，感觉总体关卡设计还是很流畅的、

这游戏是之前为了补票CS买的V社大礼包里的，礼包里还有一大堆Half-Life相关游戏，够我慢慢玩一阵子了、

中文语音听起来好怪哦，挺有意思再听一遍，好怪哦，不知道咋配的、

玩到最后才发现弓弩右键可以放大……少了潜行暗杀的乐趣、

想玩Alyx但是买不起VR设备……加油搬砖挣钱吧、[叹气]

涉及剧透：

[spoiler]感觉主角挺惨的，从地底一路杀上来（最后还杀到外星球），满满的个人英雄主义，以为能有个爽文结局，结果到头来只是为他人做嫁衣、[/spoiler]

[spoiler]最后选择不跟G-Man合作面对的就是“一场永远打不赢的战争”，按照Half-Life 2的剧情（视频的评论区了解到的）跟他合作就直接睡20年，太惨了、[/spoiler]

[spoiler]话说G-Man原型是G胖吗？[滑稽][/spoiler]

Half Life. This is a TItan of the industry, and it shows, the graphic might not be much to look at compared to todays insane games, but the gameplay, AI, story, world interaction, and charm make up for it with room to spare. If you want an exelcent reason to just have some fun this is a amazing game to pick up and play.

Excelente juego, a pesar de sus gráficos, su dificultad y variedad, más su duración, es increíble.

As some one who didn't play halflife as a kid or teen, this is just kinda mediocre at best. Jank to high hell and overhyped.  For "The shooter that revolutionized the genere." Its more bullshit platforming and luke warm puzzles then it is shooting. The shooting isn't even that great.

To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to understand the Half-life series. The story is extremely subtle, and without a solid grasp of theoretical physics most key plot points will go over a typical player’s head. There’s also Dr.Breen’s philosophical outlook, which is deftly woven into his characterisation his personal philosophy draws heavily from Narodnaya Volya literature, for instance. The fans understand this stuff; they have the intellectual capacity to truly appreciate the depths of the story, to realise that they’re not just emotional- they say something deep about LIFE. As a consequence people who dislike Half-Life truly ARE idiots- of course they wouldn’t appreciate, for instance, the charm in Alyx who is a very import character as she interacts with you and look for a way to save her father. I’m smirking right now just imagining one of those addlepated simpletons scratching their heads in confusion as Gabe Newell’s genius wit unfolds itself on their television screens. What fools.. how I pity them.

And yes, by the way, i DO have a Lambda tattoo. And no, you cannot see it. It’s for the ladies’ eyes only- and even then they have to demonstrate that they’re within 5 IQ points of my own (preferably lower) beforehand. Nothin personnel kids.

El inicio de una gran saga con los enemigos que mas aprecio le tengo en la saga, realmente los diseños de la fauna de XEN es asombrosa y me hubiera gustado mucho volver a verlos en HL2 o tener más referencias de ellos en la continuidad de la saga.
Actualmente te recomendaría jugar Black Mesa Source si eres nuevo en la saga y te gusta mas el rollo de los gráficos en videojuegos, pero si quieres jugar el original puedes conseguirlo con el Valve Pack en las rebajas de Steam por 10 mangos estadounidenses.
